text: Ostrów Mazowiecka is a main town of Ostrów County, Masovian Voivodeship, Poland. * Population (as of 2008): a. 23 540 * Area: 22,09 km² * Town status: Since 1434 * Postal code: 07-300, 07-302, 07-310 * Current Mayor: Hubert Betlejewski * Community: Ostrów * Twin town: Brembate di Sopra (Italy), Iziaslav (Ukraine) ==Related pages== * Brok Category:Towns in Masovian Voivodeship Category:Ostrowian County (Poland)
title: Ostrów Mazowiecka
